9111 dorse, 1597.

The qnhilk day Johne Mudie fleshour burges 01 Poisley wes 11000101 01
his 01110 010001 0001000100 10 pey to Johne Quheytford 01 that 1111 10011010
unds money 101 0011101 0011010 0011 at Beltane 1001 with 000111000110 money
1011110 01100 01 ane young ox 00111110 tyme 101100111.
